name: PUIQ: Demons
description: PUIQ: Demons is a game where you must survive several waves of demons and bosses for 25 minutes to win. Gain powers, passives and combine them to get buffs, as well as buy turrets, and other equipment to improve your train to help you on this journey. Win the game to compete for the ranking of the best in the world at killing demons and earn rare achievements to show who the real exorcist is.
